My new site Jekyll

Simple

No more databases, comment
moderation, or pesky updates to
install—just your content.

How Jekyll works →

Complated code

~ $ gem install bundler jekyll
~ $ jekyll new my-awesome-site
~ $ cd my-awesome-site
~ $ bundle exec jekyll serve
# => Now browse to http://localhost:4000
